name: Classic Homes Website
summary: Official website for Classic Homes, the leading local homebuilder and land developer in the Pikes Peak region since 1989.

name: Classic Homes Online Design Studio
summary: Online Design Studio for Classic Homes that allows online selection of home customization options, viewing home of build status and information, and keeping track of service requests.

name: The Club at Flying Horse Website
summary: The Club at Flying Horse is a golf course and club in Colorado Springs focused on providing a first class golf, recreation and dining Club experience that is unparalleled in the Rocky Mountain region.

name: The Lodge at Flying Horse
summary: The Lodge at Flying Horse is a AAA Four Diamond Hotel designation and is one of Colorado's most desirable boutique resort and meeting destinations located in the heart of the Flying Horse community.

name: The Steakhouse at Flying Horse
summary: The Steakhouse at Flying Horse is a contemporary restaurant in a beautiful Tuscan style villa with dazzling views of the Front Range.

name: Flying Horse Ranch
summary: Flying Horse Ranch in Douglas County is one of the finest cattle & equestrian ranches in the Front Range of Colorado.

name: Flying Horse Wedding Venues
summary: The Flying Horse Wedding Venues provides an easy jumping off point for lucky couples looking for a wedding on the front range.

name: Flying Horse Realty
summary: Flying Horse Realty is a real estate agency serving the front range of Colorado. They provide personalized service with a specialty on Colorado Springs communities and new home builds.

name: Athabasca Fishing Lodges
summary: Athabasca Fishing Lodges is a trophy fly-in fishing camp on Canada's famous Lake Athabasca in Northern Saskatchewan.

name: Hummingbird Hammocks
summary: Hummingbird Hammocks is an ultralight backpacking and camping gear manufacturer specializing in hammocks and hammock related accessories.

name: Buy and Sell with Kathy L
summary: Personal realtor website for Kathy Loidolt, a results-driven and client-focused real estate agent serving Southern Colorado.

name: KLo Home Design
summary: KLo Home Design is an up and coming interior design company run by my sister Kim Loidolt. Kim specializes in modern designs that highlight your home's existing features.

name: The Milton Camp
summary: The Milton Camp is a camp in upstate New York on Lake Pleasant. A quiet little location for rest and relaxation.
